full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,GNYAN KHROD YIG CHUNG GSAL BA'I SGRON ME ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @016A *, ,(ZHES MKHA' 'GRO'I SNYAN @016B BRGYUD KYI GNYAN KHROD 'GRO BAS ZHAL SHES YIG CHUNG 'DI YANG MKHAS GRUB BYAMS PA KARMA DAR RGYAS KYI GSUNGS LAS JI LTAR 'BYUNG BA BZHIN, GANG ZAG BLO RMANGS SHING SHES RAB CHUNG LA RANG DANG SKAL BA MNYAM PA RNAMS KYI DON DU CHOS MED DGE SLONG BYAMS PA LHA DBANG RIG 'DZIN GYIS BKOD PA'O, BLO DANG LDAN PA RNAMS KYIS SNYAN BRGYUD ZHAL GDAMS CHEN PO MA RIG MUN SEL SOGS, RGYAS PA RNAMS LA GZIGS PAR ZHU, SLAR YANG GSAL BYED KYI LHAN THABS CUNG ZAD NGAG DBANG PHUN TSOGS NAS BGYIS PA'O,)
